data: Kandrapu Reddy Senior Travel Operations (Domestic, International & Leisure) - International Travel House Limited  Visakhapatnam, Andhra Pradesh - Email me on Indeed: indeed.com/r/Kandrapu- Reddy/69a289269ce9e1d1  To contribute for the success and expansion of an organization ensuring personal and professional growth by continuously increasing my skills, obtaining wide exposure at all levels where job demands efforts which include learning new concepts, Handling pressure situations and communicating ideas clearly and effectively. This role provides the key responsibilities of:  • Handling Domestic and International GDS bookings & Getting Confirmations from airlines for lower class fares. • Preparing Itineraries as per client requirement. • Having a continuous track over Mail, by giving swift response for client queries. • Issuing Flight tickets, Making leisure packages & Hotel reservations. • Delivering Visa guidance for corporate queries. • Key focus on the Client maintenance with satisfaction, result design and industry development. • Preparing and submitting bills to the corporate clients on Fortnight basis every month. • Perform multi-tasking by looking into Car rental operation (Implant), By Allocating chauffer with cab as per the standards of company.  Travel consultant  RIYA TOURS AND TRAVELS PRIVATE .LIMITED -  Visakhapatnam, Andhra Pradesh -  https://www.indeed.com/r/Kandrapu-Reddy/69a289269ce9e1d1?isid=rex-download&ikw=download-top&co=IN https://www.indeed.com/r/Kandrapu-Reddy/69a289269ce9e1d1?isid=rex-download&ikw=download-top&co=IN   February 2016 to July 2016  Riya Travels & Tours has an extensive network of more than 50+ branch offices across India and 10 internationally by delivering travel services corporate & Leisure.  This role provides the key responsibilities of:  • Handling Domestic and International GDS bookings (Amadeus & Galileo). • Preparing Itineraries as per client requirement. • Having a continuous track over Mail, by giving swift response for client queries. • Issuing Flight tickets as per the client need. • Managing the most important corporates by me, to ensure the utmost service rendered to our esteemed clients on time and with precision. • Assistance regarding visa, tourism packages, hotels & airport transfers.  Implant Infosys Travel consultant  Head quarters of BHARATH INTERNATIONAL TRAVELS PVT.LTD -  Mysore, Karnataka -  March 2015 to January 2016  Bharath International Travels (BIT), an ISO 9001:2008 Quality Assurance Compliant, is a leading IATA accredited travel company in Karnataka that offers the entire gamut of travel related services to business and leisure travelers.  This role provides the key responsibilities of: • Handling flight bookings & Getting Confirmations from airlines. • Looking after travel requirements of Infosys Employees by giving swift response to their queries through mail. • Maintaining daily sales report by ensuring the given targets to be achieved. • Keys focus on providing quality service to the implant employees.  • Trained in AKBAR TRAVELS OF INDIA PVT.LTD, Visakhapatnam since 01st Aug, 2014 to 31st Feb, 2015.  Akbar Travels of India is the largest Travel Agent in India in terms of IATA approved Branches. Akbar Travels is approved by International Air Transport Association and is the member of prestigious trade bodies like Travel Agents Association of India, Travel Agents Federation of India and IATA Agents Association of India.  • Trained on Amadeus & Galileo airline software's. Nikhileshkumar Ikhar Product development engineer with 7+ years of experience with M.Tech. in IT. It is an agriculture-based online marketplace in US B2B market. First non-co-founding engineer to come on board reported directly to CTO. Developed Reverse Auction Engine. A farmer would bid for their SKU and engine would pick farmer based on bidding and capacity. Developed Palletization engine. A pallet can have multiple SKU boxes from multiple buyers. The engine generates a packing sequence of boxes in pallets in a truck container according to the delivery route. Developed prototype to categorize SKU with Deep learning. Owned delivery of functionalities development, behavioural nudges, shaping of platform business model, aligning of product development to business. Architected, designed & deployed websites, database, UI/UX to facilitate farm fresh produce procurement & delivery to end consumers. Owned and developed various features like,  Inventory management plays a big role in optimizing cold storage, warehouse and trucking requirement. It helped in reducing crop wastage. Invoicing of sold crops and tracking payments. Order tracking for buyer and seller. Fetching USDA price list daily via a web crawler. Generating various reports in online, CSV and PDF format. Worked with technologies like Python, Django, Celery, MySQL, MongoDB, Ubuntu, Neural Network. First, six months employer was Above Solutions.
